page.title: 08WECOCK YOUTH CLUB
page.content: The club is for children age 8 and 13. The entry fee is 15p. It is on every Thursday from 7p.m. to 9p.m. It is run by a group of volunteers and is held in our Village Centre. You can play badminton,snooker and table tennis. At 8.30p.m. you pick teams to play hockey. You may do cooking or sewing with a helper. Refreshments are available such as hot-dogs,sweets, crisps and drinks. Every first Thursday of the month there is a disco. There is also a senior disco for older children and you can buy refreshments. Sometimes the boys play football on the field. One of the people who runs it is Dave, every one knows him. Sometimes the girls play rounders. They even have a Christmas party.
